name: kraken's curse
description:
Controls

  • X to grab
  • Z to use item / shoot cannon
  • C to swap item / cannon side

Also playable with controller.

Special thanks to Joanne for the voice-acting!

Note: the game is not saved when you quit or restart!


Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks!
